tool_description: Beer Lover API list more than 30,000 unique beers with diverse information (score, brewery, country, etc.)
name: Beer Lover
title: Beer Lover

api_list.name: GET all beers from a given country
api_list.description: Retrieve the beer(s) with the country matching {country} (exact match, not case sensitive)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beer-lover.p.rapidapi.com/search/country/United States"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beer-lover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://beer-lover.p.rapidapi.com/search/country/{country}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beer-lover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET a beer(s) by name or brewery as a fuzzy search
api_list.description: Retrieve the beer(s) with the name or brewery name matching {query} (fuzzy search)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beer-lover.p.rapidapi.com/search/all/Flying Dog"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beer-lover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET beer per id
